description: The pink shower (Cassia grandis) is an amazing plant species that is highly sought after for its brilliant sprays of vibrant pink flower clusters. It produces fragrant, soft pink flowers that contrast beautifully against its lush green foliage. This medium-sized tree is perfect for creating privacy in your garden and can be pruned to keep its size manageable. It requires minimal maintenance and can thrive in tropical or temperate climates. It also has high drought tolerance. The pink shower can be planted as a specimen tree or in a container for added beauty. Its sweet charm and grand flowering clusters make it an amazing asset to any landscape.
